user.title: Stateful Scenes
user.description:
Creates a switch for each YAML-defined scene and keeps the switch ON when the scene's entities match the scene.

If you choose a file or directory source, enter its path in 'Scene Path'.

data_description.source: Where to load scene YAML from. Default is from configuration.yaml.
data_description.scene_file: Scene file or directory path (ignored when loading from configuration.yaml).
data_description.settle_time: Seconds to keep a scene optimistically active after it is turned on before verifying entity states.
data_description.number_tolerance: Allowed difference when comparing numeric attributes (brightness 0-255, position, etc.).
data_description.ignore_unavailable: Ignore entities that are 'unavailable' or 'unknown' instead of marking the scene inactive.
data_description.exclude_circadian_controls: Exclude entities matching the circadian pattern from matching and turn-off.
data_description.circadian_pattern: Glob pattern(s) to exclude (comma-separated). Default: switch.circadian_lighting*

error.source_not_found: The selected scene source could not be found.
error.source_invalid: The selected scene source could not be parsed as scene YAML.
